}} The '1947â48 season' was Colchester United's fifth consecutive full season in
the Southern Football League. Colchester finished fourth in the league and
progressed to the fifth round of the FA Cup. They were runners-up in both the
Southern League Cup, although the final wasn't held until April 1949 due to
fixture congestion.
